-------------------

Here playing with the Hold node : using the notes in an unusual metric ratio, so that the two generated "hold" basses with own triggers catch a lot of different values. The notes are also used to command CO filter values through Ã  mapping to numbers between 0 and 1. The rest is cosmetics.

Enjoy,

(a or not b)"},"inNames":[],"outNames":[]}}}
